bibl.title: The Hektor-Deiphobos Agon in Euripides' Alexandros (frr. 62a–b K.: P. Stras. 2342, 2 and 2343).
bibl.note: Re-inspection of P. Stras. Inv. 2342, 2 and 2343 (= M.-P.3 432; LDAB 7117). The agonistic character of the altercation between Hektor and Deiphobos.
bibl.seg: KARAMANOU Ioanna, The Hektor-Deiphobos Agon in Euripides' Alexandros (frr. 62a–b K.: P. Stras. 2342, 2 and 2343).
Re-inspection of P. Stras. Inv. 2342, 2 and 2343 (= M.-P.3 432; LDAB 7117). The agonistic character of the altercation between Hektor and Deiphobos.
